dcterms:description: A multi-label movie genre classification dataset containing 25,959 films, each with a poster, plot summary, and metadata including directors, actors, and publication year.
dcterms:title: MM-IMDb

dcterms:description: A newly created dataset for movie genre classification, comprising 33,742 movies collected from the IMDb website, with an enhanced difficulty level compared to the MM-IMDb dataset.
dcterms:title: MM-IMDb 2.0
